credentials.title: Google Credentials
credentials.description: Google APIs use the OAuth 2.0 protocol for authentication and authorization. The Source supports Web server application and Service accounts scenarios.

oneOf.title: Sign in via Google (OAuth)
oneOf.description: For these scenario user only needs to give permission to read Google Directory data.

client_id.title: Client ID
client_id.description: The Client ID of the developer application.

client_secret.title: Client secret
client_secret.description: The Client Secret of the developer application.

refresh_token.title: Refresh Token
refresh_token.description: The Token for obtaining a new access token.

oneOf.title: Service Account Key
oneOf.description: For these scenario user should obtain service account's credentials from the Google API Console and provide delegated email.

credentials_json.title: Credentials JSON
credentials_json.description: The contents of the JSON service account key. See the docs for more information on how to generate this key.

email.title: Email
email.description: The email of the user, which has permissions to access the Google Workspace Admin APIs.
